name: Crytter
description:
Crytter is an arcade horror game in which you plunge yourself into the seemingly infinite crypt of a suspiciously abandoned cathedral in the middle of nowhere for the riches and valuables hidden within.

Each time you enter the crypt, it'll never quite be the same.

As a disclaimer: This game is currently in an early alpha state and, as such, has various missing features alongside the bugs and possible performance issues that may come along with it.

If you wish to play this game in windowed mode, press Alt+Enter. We currently do not have the option to resize the game.

If you want to keep an eye on our projects, you can follow us through the links below:

  • Discord
  • YouTube

Made in Unity.
Special Thanks to the following who inspired the project:

  • Valefisk
  • rogueNoodle
